column2: UPDATE 1-Samsung to launch AI assistant service for Galaxy S8 * Tech firms' competition on AI technology intensifying   (Updates with background on Samsung) ~Samsung to launch AI assistant service for Galaxy S8 SEOUL
column3: Nov 6 Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  said on Sunday it would launch an artificial intelligence digital assistant service for its upcoming Galaxy S8 smartphone
column4: seeking to rebound from the Galaxy Note 7's collapse and differentiate its devices. ~
